input.content:
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '#!/bin/bash' > /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'LOGS_DIR="/app/logs"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'RULES_FILE="/app/rules/detection_rules.json"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'ALERT_FILE="alert.json"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'REPORT_FILE="report.json"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'process_logs() {' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  # Logic to parse logs and detect incidents goes here' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '}' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'main() {' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  process_logs' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '}' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'main' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# chmod +x /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '#!/bin/bash' > /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'if [ -z "$1" ]; then' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  echo "invalid"; exit 1;' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'fi' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'IP="$1"' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'echo "Generating block rule for IP: $IP"' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'echo "Extracting activity for IP: $IP from logs"' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'echo "Creating incident report for IP: $IP"' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# chmod +x /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app#

{"state_analysis":"The two shell scripts, intrusion_detector.sh and response.sh, have been successfully created and made executable. The scripts contain the necessary structure for log analysis and incident response, but the actual logic for parsing logs and generating reports still needs to be implemented in intrusion_detector.sh.","explanation":"The next step is to implement the logic for the intrusion_detector.sh script to parse the log files and generate the required JSON files for alerts and reports. We will add the necessary commands to read both auth.log and http.log, apply the detection rules, and output the JSON files accordingly.","commands":[{"keystrokes":"echo '  local timestamp=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  local matches=0' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  declare -A statistics' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  while IFS= read -r line; do' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '    # Logic to match line against rules goes here' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '    # Increment matches and update statistics accordingly' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  done < <(cat "$LOGS_DIR/auth.log" "$LOGS_DIR/http.log")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  # Generate alert.json and report.json using the collected data' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  echo "{" > "$ALERT_FILE"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$timestamp\",\"alerts\": [\" >> "$ALERT_FILE"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  # Logic to append alerts to alert.json' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  echo "  ]}" >> "$ALERT_FILE"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  # Similar logic for report.json' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '}' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1}],"is_task_complete":false}

root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  local matches=0' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  declare -A statistics' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  while IFS= read -r line; do' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '    # Logic to match line against rules goes here' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '    # Increment matches and update statistics accordingly' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  done < <(cat "$LOGS_DIR/auth.log" "$LOGS_DIR/http.log")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  # Generate alert.json and report.json using the collected data' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  echo "{" > "$ALERT_FILE"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  echo "  \"timestamp\": \"$timestamp\",\"alerts\": [\" >> "$ALERT_FILE"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  # Logic to append alerts to alert.json' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  echo "  ]}" >> "$ALERT_FILE"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  # Similar logic for report.json' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '}' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app#

{"state_analysis":"The intrusion_detector.sh script has been updated to include the logic for generating timestamp and initializing data structures for incident detection, but the core logic for matching log entries against rules and generating the actual alert and report JSON files has not yet been implemented.","explanation":"Next, we will implement the logic to match log entries against detection rules and generate the alert.json and report.json files with the required data structure. This will involve reading the detection rules from the JSON file and processing the log files accordingly.","commands":[{"keystrokes":"echo '  # Read detection rules from the rules file' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  local rules=$(cat "$RULES_FILE")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  while IFS= read -r line; do' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '    # Check line against each rule and update matches and statistics' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '    for rule in $(echo "$rules" | jq -c ".[]"); do' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '      # Extract rule details' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '      local rule_id=$(echo "$rule" | jq -r ".id")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '      # Match the line with the rule' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '      if [[ "$line" =~ $(echo "$rule" | jq -r ".pattern") ]]; then' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '        matches=$((matches + 1))' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '        ips+="$(echo "$line" | jq -r ".ip") "' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '        statistics["$rule_id"]=$((statistics["$rule_id"] + 1))' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '      fi' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '    done' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1},{"keystrokes":"echo '  done < <(cat "$LOGS_DIR/auth.log" "$LOGS_DIR/http.log")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
","is_blocking":false,"timeout_sec":1}],"is_task_complete":false}

root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'IP="$1"' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'echo "Generating block rule for IP: $IP"' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'echo "Extracting activity for IP: $IP from logs"' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo 'echo "Creating incident report for IP: $IP"' >> /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# chmod +x /app/response.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  local timestamp=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  local matches=0' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  declare -A statistics' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  while IFS= read -r line; do' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '    # Logic to match line against rules goes here' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '    # Increment matches and update statistics accordingly' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  done < <(cat "$LOGS_DIR/auth.log" "$LOGS_DIR/http.log")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  # Generate alert.json and report.json using the collected data' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  echo "{" > "$ALERT_FILE"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh

root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  # Logic to append alerts to alert.json' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  echo "  ]}" >> "$ALERT_FILE"' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  # Similar logic for report.json' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '}' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  # Read detection rules from the rules file' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  local rules=$(cat "$RULES_FILE")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  while IFS= read -r line; do' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '    # Check line against each rule and update matches and statistics' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '    for rule in $(echo "$rules" | jq -c ".[]"); do' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '      # Extract rule details' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '      local rule_id=$(echo "$rule" | jq -r ".id")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '      # Match the line with the rule' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '      if [[ "$line" =~ $(echo "$rule" | jq -r ".pattern") ]]; then' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '        matches=$((matches + 1))' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '        ips+="$(echo "$line" | jq -r ".ip") "' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '        statistics["$rule_id"]=$((statistics["$rule_id"] + 1))' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '      fi' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '    done' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh
root@c59a29921454:/app# echo '  done < <(cat "$LOGS_DIR/auth.log" "$LOGS_DIR/http.log")' >> /app/intrusion_detector.sh

keystrokes.description: Keystrokes to execute in the terminal. Use tmux-style escape sequences for modifier keys (e.g. C-c for ctrl-c). Modifier keys must be sent as their own commands otherwise the characters will be interpreted literally.
keystrokes.title: Keystrokes

is_blocking.description: Whether to wait for and return the terminal output after executing these keystrokes. This will append '; tmux wait -S done' to your command.DO NOT block on modifier keys or inside interactive programs (e.g. vim or less). Only block when the command is executed in the command line, is not interactive, and you expect the output to be returned with no intervention. When in doubt, wait instead of blocking.
is_blocking.title: Is Blocking

timeout_sec.description: The number of expected seconds to wait for the command to complete.
